Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.configuration

Class UploadConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.configuration.UploadConfiguration
  • @Component
@ConfigurationProperties(prefix="upload")
public class UploadConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Declares a hierarchical set of properties, mapping to a corresponding hierarchy of application properties, all with the "upload." prefix. These properties customize the root path, filename generation, and subdirectory organization used by the LocalFilesystemStorageService.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties
      Encapsulates properties specifying the composition of filenames generated for files uploaded and stored in the file store.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      UploadConfiguration()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getDirectory()
      Returns the base directory of the file store, relative to the application home directory (if isApplicationHome() returns true) or to the current working directory.
      UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties getFilename()
      Returns a UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties instance, used to customize generation of filenames in the file store.
      java.util.regex.Pattern getSubdirectoryPattern()
      Returns a regular expression pattern that (in general) includes one or more capture groups, used for constructing a subdirectory path for any given generated filename.
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWhitelist()
      Returns the set of MIME types permitted for upload into the file store.
      boolean isApplicationHome()
      Returns a flag indicating whether the application's home directory should be used as the parent directory of the file store.
      void setApplicationHome​(boolean applicationHome)
      Sets a flag indicating whether the application's home directory should be used as the parent directory of the file store.
      void setDirectory​(java.lang.String directory)
      Sets the base directory of the file store.
      void setFilename​(UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties filename)
      Sets the UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties instance used to customize generation of filenames in the file store.
      void setSubdirectoryPattern​(java.util.regex.Pattern subdirectoryPattern)
      Sets the regular expression pattern used to capture the subdirectory path components from a generated filename.
      void setWhitelist​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> whitelist)
      Sets the set of MIME types permitted for upload into the file store.

    • Method Detail

      • isApplicationHome

        public boolean isApplicationHome()
        Returns a flag indicating whether the application's home directory should be used as the parent directory of the file store.

      • setApplicationHome

        public void setApplicationHome​(boolean applicationHome)
        Sets a flag indicating whether the application's home directory should be used as the parent directory of the file store.

      • getDirectory

        public java.lang.String getDirectory()
        Returns the base directory of the file store, relative to the application home directory (if isApplicationHome() returns true) or to the current working directory.

      • setDirectory

        public void setDirectory​(java.lang.String directory)
        Sets the base directory of the file store. If directory is an absolute path, then it will be used as-is; otherwise, it will be interpreted relative to the application home directory (if isApplicationHome() returns true) or to the current working directory.

      • getSubdirectoryPattern

        public java.util.regex.Pattern getSubdirectoryPattern()
        Returns a regular expression pattern that (in general) includes one or more capture groups, used for constructing a subdirectory path for any given generated filename.

      • setSubdirectoryPattern

        public void setSubdirectoryPattern​(java.util.regex.Pattern subdirectoryPattern)
        Sets the regular expression pattern used to capture the subdirectory path components from a generated filename.

      • getWhitelist

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getWhitelist()
        Returns the set of MIME types permitted for upload into the file store.

      • setWhitelist

        public void setWhitelist​(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> whitelist)
        Sets the set of MIME types permitted for upload into the file store.

      • getFilename

        public UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties getFilename()
        Returns a UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties instance, used to customize generation of filenames in the file store.

      • setFilename

        public void setFilename​(UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties filename)
        Sets the UploadConfiguration.FilenameProperties instance used to customize generation of filenames in the file store.
